featureType.name: pois_info
featureType.title: pois_info
featureType.nativeCRS: GEOGCS["WGS 84", DATUM["World Geodetic System 1984", SPHEROID["WGS 84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563, AUTHORITY["EPSG","7030"]], AUTHORITY["EPSG","6326"]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0, AUTHORITY["EPSG","8901"]], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH], AUTHORITY["EPSG","4326"]]

virtualTable.name: pois_test
virtualTable.sql: select p.name,p.amenity,p.osm_id,p.orgin_geometry,p.geom from pois p,variable_container v where amenity = any(v.variable_array) and v.identifier = 'poi_categories' union all select pt.name,pt.public_transport_stop,null as osm_id,null as orgin_geometry,pt.geom from public_transport_stops pt
